GapFillDragDrop.Title: Countable and uncountable nouns
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. We can give yousome advice.
2. Have you heardany news?
3. We only saw a few lions on safari: just two or three lions.
4. That room only has one piece of furniture.
5. I have a lot of work to do. I'll be working all weekend.
6. We don't do much travelling. Only once a year to visit our parents.
7. He gave her a little money to buy food.
8. I haven't written many cheques recently.
